snippet: The safety agency ruled that small drones are a type of aircraft and fall under existing rules.
abstract: National Transportation Safety Board says government has power to hold drone operators accountable when they operate them recklessly; rules small drones are a type of aircraft and fall under existing Federal Aviation Administration rules.
lead_paragraph: The safety agency ruled that small drones are a type of aircraft and fall under existing rules.

headline.main: F.A.A. Has Power to Levy Fines on Commercial Drone Users
headline.print_headline: F.A.A. Has Power to Levy Fines on Commercial Drone Users
